about me

Hello! I'm Mike. I design, build, and deploy web apps and websites, like the you're looking at now!

There's no job like a job done right. That's why I take the time and effort to consider every facet of the software's purpose, audience, and lifecycle, rather than just jumping straight to writing code. By rejecting the "ready-fire-aim" mentality, I make sure that the solutions I deliver are good for the end-users, for the developers, and for the software itself.
